Professional Documentation

Qualifications and Certification

  • 4 years experience in special education and teaching language arts in a private school that specializes in working with students with language-based learning disabilities.
  • 6 years experience as Residential/Student Life staff communicating expectations, coordinating off campus trips, and overseeing the safety of all students.
  • Knowledge, understanding and practice implementing strategies for students with language based learning disabilities
  • Completion of M.S. Special Education, Moderate Special Needs, Simmons College in June 2014.
